Good Comments: I'd prefer Hadena, and that's saying something.
BAD! But I got no choice but to watch it from them.
fast, translation is decent, grammar is good, typos can be worked on though.
Maybe not the best quality, but at least it provides watchable subtitles in time.
super fast and better then your average quality
Fast, decent translation. Just nice that some other groups take bakuman on.
Bad Comments: Typos/poor spelling abound ("give me a brake", "PSP", etc.) and the timing definitely needs some improvement. There is also an issue with missing subs in some parts (fairly simple lines, at that), and the translations aren't fantastic.
Poorly timed, badly written, and badly laid out. (Two characters' dialogue appears at once with no indication as to who's talking)
lol at all the SAGE staff voting down rival groups
They're very unrefined - basically literal/machine translation.
"give me a brake", it felt like it was some inside joke i wasn't in on but still it gave me a laugh. it was great to have as an extra choice for bakuman. to bad they only did a few episodes
